course_description: For non-majors who have successfully completed PHYS 115 or 116. Topics of contemporary astrophysical research including exoplanets and habitability, the first stars, Galactic and extragalactic astronomy, black holes, quasars, large-scale structure, dark matter, dark energy, and cosmology.
prerequisites: PHYS 115 or PHYS 116 or ASTR_OX 116 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - E300
sections: Class Nbr: 1293, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Bans, Status: Open
